'''Thirona's Support''' is an [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]]. This card can only be created through [[Serene (Support Card)|Serene]] and cannot be included in the deck otherwise.

==Gameplay Notes==
Thirona's Support can generate any of the following cards:

{{TCG Card|Elemental Resonance: Shattering Ice|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Elemental Resonance: Soothing Water|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Elemental Resonance: Fervent Flames|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Elemental Resonance: High Voltage|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Elemental Resonance: Impetuous Winds|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Elemental Resonance: Enduring Rock|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Elemental Resonance: Sprawling Greenery|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Wind and Freedom|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Stone and Contracts|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Thunder and Eternity|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Nature and Wisdom|caption=1}}{{TCG Card|Water and Justice|caption=1}}
